International Family Tour Packages From India

Who doesn't love to spend quality time with family? Especially when you don't get the spell on normal days, you must plan family holidays to see that excitement on your kid's face. But going to a whole new place without any research can lead you to face unwanted consequences. That's why we are here to help you with some pro tips that you must keep in mind- no matter which family summer vacation ideas you are working on! So without wasting another minute, let's check it out.

Customize International family tour packages

If you are visiting with kids or older persons, make sure the trip becomes comfortable enough for them. Starting from car seats to activities, personalize everything accordingly. Ultimately all of you want to enjoy it together. So, if any of you get sick or feel uncomfortable, the whole trip will be spoiled. So, whatever you do, think and do it wisely.

Go for advanced booking on Family Holiday Vacations

Another thing you need to ensure is everything is planned beforehand and picture-perfect. Nowadays, everything can be done online- from accommodation to your whole itinerary. Even, it can save on your budget as well besides helping you to avoid all those extra hassles.

Choose the best areas to stay

You must select the place of lodging very carefully. From food to your rooms, everything should be hygienic enough that any of you don't fall sick. Alongside, if you're travelling to a hill station, check which height is comfortable for breathing. Especially for children and elderly people, staying at too much height can cause breathing problems.

Keep a first aid kit along with regular medicines

For any emergency situation, you must have the precautions to overcome it. Carry a first aid kit on your family holidays. Also, if you are travelling with a diabetic patient or with anyone who has some chronic disease like this, make sure the regular medication is within your reach while travelling.

Check for the weather conditions beforehand

Any place, which represents nature's beauty, looks at it's best, at specific seasons. For instance, the month of October is the best time to visit Bali. A little rain, low humidity and full of Sun let you chill through the day without even getting tired. So researching the best season to visit your desired destination is a must-do job.

Be safe throughout your journey. Travelling with family comes with a number of responsibilities and a few dos and don'ts. Book exciting summer vacation packages for family and fly out to spend your family holidays.

Check our top selling family tour packages from India in 2024: Dubai family packages, Australia family packages, and Maldives family package.

After searching for travel agencies, I came across Pickyourtrail, and Sanjai C called me up, it took 3 days to finalise the itinerary after omitting and editing it numerous times. The chat support was very responsive, and Mr Sanjai went out of his way to help me even during late hours. He finalised the itinerary according to the budget. Thank you, Mr Sanjai! He worked on my itinerary till late night and kept even the minutest detail in mind while curating my plan. He became enthusiastic when I told him that this will be our first trip overseas and this is dedicated to our daughter as we will be travelling immediately after her exams to give her a nice break. Ms Tika, of Bali Bagus i.e the car agency too helped wherever required, everything was on time, was never left hanging. During our entire trip, we had 3 drivers, Mr Darsana(throughout the entire trip), Mr Jack and Mr Wendy(for one day). Mr Darsana, our driver, guide and photographer, could not have been more efficient. Always punctual and regular, whilst telling us all about the places we visited. Very polite and helpful, always smiling :) couldn't have asked for a better guide than him. In Nusa Penida, the second guide, Mr Jack, even in his short time with us helped us a lot, and was an amazing photographer. He met us on time, and the Nusa Penida trip went smoothly without any hassles. Am amazed at the coordination between the Bali Bagus team as they clicked our pictures to let each other know our details and when and where to meet! Mr Wendy, the third driver was with us for a very short period of time, from the Nusa Penida pick up point to the hotel, but in that time we learnt a lot about Bali and he himself in return learnt a lot about India. He had a good sense of humour and wide range knowledge as well. He has been a great fan of bollywood and Shahrukh Khan. I highly recommend Pickyourtrail to anyone looking for a stress-free and unforgettable travel experience. Ill definitely be using their services again and will recommend to my family and friends. Our hearts are filled with wonderful memories
